attributes.action: Ban credit card and loan companies to send application forms as junk mail
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some people are sent application forms through the post as junk mail for either credit card or loans. They should be banned as 1. they land into the hands of people who don't know how these work 2. Does not show how much they would be repaying each month with loans 3. Some people are vulnerable (esp the eldery) and cause more debt problems in the future. If people want to apply for a loan or credit card, they must contact the company themselves either by phone, branch or website.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban credit card and loan companies to send application forms as junk mail."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
